Title: New Idles by Reflection Rip
Description:
Adds some new idles in Joppa that make it a more lively city.

Campfire Idle, Beds for NPC's to sleep in, and Guard Posts that guards change shift on.

Will add idles in other locations later and more idle types.

Source can be found on GitHub: https://github.com/ReflectionRip/ReflectionRip_Idles/tree/master
